tool_description: Vedic Rishi Free APIs for Basic Astrological and Horoscope Details along with numerous Numerological details. It also provides panchang or hindu/indian calendar details.
name: Basic Horoscope and Numerology
title: Basic Horoscope and Numerology

api_list.name: Numerology basic details
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://vedicrishi-horoscope-matching-v1.p.rapidapi.com/numero_table/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "vedicrishi-horoscope-matching-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Birth Details
api_list.description: Along with birth details it provides sunrise, sunset, ayanamsha as well.

api_list.name: Basic Astrological Details
api_list.description: Provides the complete avakahada details e.g. nakshtatra, charan, tithi, karan, yog ,varna, vashaya, yoni, etc
api_list.code:

url = "https://vedicrishi-horoscope-matching-v1.p.rapidapi.com/astro_details/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "vedicrishi-horoscope-matching-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Basic panchang details at the time of sunrise
api_list.description: Provides data points for panchang elements, chaugadiya and sunrise and set time at he time of  sunrise.

utterances.utterance: Can you provide the panchang details at sunrise today?
What are the panchang elements for sunrise on January 1st, 2023?
Give me the sunrise panchang details for tomorrow.
I need the panchang details at sunrise for next Monday.
Please provide the sunrise panchang details for December 25th, 2023.
What are the panchang elements at sunrise on the first day of spring?
Can you give me the panchang details at sunrise for the upcoming festival?
I need the sunrise panchang details for the next full moon.
Provide the panchang details at sunrise for the summer solstice.
What are the panchang elements at sunrise on my birthday, March 15th?

api_list.name: Basic panchang details
